name: Wii Uâ„¢ Panorama View Carnival!
description: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil In this Carnival video, you will be standing in the middle of the musical and vivacious carnival parade that takes place in Rio de Janeiro. You will experience the parade from the different perspectives of the audience sitting on the stadium benches. You will see the performers in the parade coming towards you and look back to see the group who have passed by.
